titleInfo.title: Coed moving books into new periodical annex - for news release

mods.abstract: On October 15, 1971, several buildings on Tennessee Techâ€™s campus were dedicated and renamed as follows: Biology and Agriculture Building was renamed Pennebaker Hall; Business Administration Building was renamed Johnson Hall; Chemistry Building was renamed Foster Hall; Civil and Industrial Engineering Building was renamed Prescott Hall; Dormitory E for Women was renamed Jobe Hall; Dormitory D for Women was renamed Murphy Hall; Education Building was renamed T J Farr Education Building; Engineering Facilities Building was renamed Brown Hall; Northeast Hall for Men was renamed Warf Hall; Physics-Mathematics Building was renamed Bruner Hall; South Hall for Men was renamed Dunn Hall; and Southeast Hall for Men was renamed Crawford Hall.

subject.topic: Tennessee Technological University. Jere Whitson Building

titleInfo.title: RG 112 Photo Services photographs, Box 37, Folder 177.
